alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Hancock; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:17PM EDT until July 24 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hancock County in central Kentucky... West central Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Ohio County in central Kentucky... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 517 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Hawesville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hawesville, Cloverport, Fordsville, Goering, Pellville, Victoria Crossroads, Floral, Patesville, Tar Fork and Cabot. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
